name: Alok
title: Full Stack Developer & UI/UX Enthusiast.
bio: Building digital experiences with code and creativity.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Developer, Designer, and Creator.
about.description1: Hello! I'm Alok, a passionate developer based in San Francisco. I love building things for the web, from simple landing pages to complex web applications.
about.description2: My journey started when I wrote my first line of code in Python. Since then, I've explored various technologies and frameworks, but I always find myself coming back to the web.
about.description3: When I'm not coding, you can find me reading about the latest tech trends, playing video games, or hiking.
